Interface ec.meta.PassBySubstitution

public interface interface PassBySubstitution
This interface marks classes that want to perform pass by susbstitution when they cross objectspace boundaries (e.g. intervat). Implementors must provide a method which returns a suitable object to be transported across the objectspace boundary, which is used when the object needs to be passed.

getSubstitute()
Implementors must make this method return the object which is to be used as the substitute for this one on the other side of an objectspace boundary.

getSubstitute 
 public abstract Object getSubstitute()
Implementors must make this method return the object which is to be used as the substitute for this one on the other side of an objectspace boundary. If the given object refers to this one, then those references are encoded by proxy.

Returns:
the substitute object to encode
